name: deep-object-assign-with-reduce
description: Minimalist deep merging of Objects with the same function signature as Object.assign()

scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --tags && git push
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --tags && git push
scripts.major: npm version major && npm publish && git push --tags && git push
scripts.npm-publish: npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.bump: ! npm outdated && npm update && npm audit fix && npm test || echo 'Package up to date.'

author: David Calhoun
